name: C.A.M.O BOT
description:
This game was developed for Weekly Game Jam  128 in 48 hours. 

It is a game where you play as a bot trying to avoid being taken over by an AI singularity. Being a military  stealth bot, you are good at stealth but not at combat. You need to sneak your way out of the facility.

CONTROLS:

A or Left Arrow: Move Left

D or Right Arrow: Move Right

Space: Boost Jump

E(hold near grappling point): select grapple point

E(release): grapple to grapple point

C(while grappling): Cancel grapple

C(when next to a wall): Toggle camo

X(while on ground): Shadow walk
